dtdlSchema.description: /Abstract/ The resource actual represents an abstract interface object to simplify the operations test model diagram. The interface object represents the objects that can report test result(s)
dtdlSchema.comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: reports
contents.description: This resource actual reports the test result in a segment response or job response (Defined in Part 4).
